title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1202.5 - Slow moving vehicles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1202.5 - Slow moving vehicles

State Regulations

Slow moving vehicles shall, unless otherwise directed, use the right lane of the roadway and shall not attempt to pass other slow
moving vehicles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1202.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
